summary: The implementation covers core infrastructure (authentication, character creation, quests, guilds, marketplace, crafting, store with Stripe) and basic 3D world rendering. However, many detailed gameplay systems are missing or incomplete, including combat mechanics, skill trees, weather, day-night cycle, multiplayer features, trading, guild wars, resource gathering, seasonal events, daily rewards, and challenges. Visual customization and UI theming are partially implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement character appearance customization interface with options for physical features, hair, skin tone, and equipment appearance
missing_requirements.reason: Character creation page only stores appearance as simple strings (hair: 'short', skinTone: 'fair', equipment: 'basic') without any UI for customization options or visual preview

missing_requirements.requirement: Build skill tree and ability system where players can allocate skill points and unlock class-specific abilities
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores skillPoints and abilities array in Character type, but no UI or logic exists for skill tree visualization, skill point allocation, or ability unlocking

missing_requirements.requirement: Create 3D open world environment using React Three Fiber with diverse biomes (forest, mountain, dungeon, city) that players can explore
missing_requirements.reason: World3D component only renders a single green ground plane with basic boxes and spheres. No distinct biomes (forest, mountain, dungeon, city) are visually represented or explorable

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement dynamic day-night cycle system that transitions between time periods and affects world lighting
missing_requirements.reason: No day-night cycle implementation found. Sky component uses static sunset preset with no time-based transitions or lighting changes

missing_requirements.requirement: Create dynamic weather system with multiple weather states (clear, rain, storm) that change environmental visuals and affect gameplay
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has WeatherState type and currentWeather variable, but no weather transition logic, visual effects (rain particles), or gameplay impact implementation exists

missing_requirements.requirement: Build real-time combat system with keyboard/touch controls for movement, basic attacks, and ability execution
missing_requirements.reason: No combat system implementation found. No controls for attacking, no enemy entities, no health/damage calculations, no combat state synchronization

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement combo attack system where sequential attacks trigger special combo moves with enhanced effects
missing_requirements.reason: No combat system exists, therefore no combo counter, combo thresholds, or special moves are implemented

missing_requirements.requirement: Create special ability system with cooldown timers where players can activate class-specific abilities during combat
missing_requirements.reason: No ability activation system, cooldown timers, or visual indicators exist in the game UI

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement ultimate skill system with charge meter that fills through combat actions and unleashes powerful class-specific attacks
missing_requirements.reason: Character type has ultimateCharged boolean but no UI for ultimate meter, no charging logic through combat, and no ultimate skill execution

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement choice-driven dialogue system where player decisions affect story outcomes, NPC relationships, and world state
missing_requirements.reason: No dialogue system, dialogue choices, NPC interaction, or consequence tracking exists in the implementation

missing_requirements.requirement: Create cooperative multiplayer mode where players can form parties to battle boss enemies together
missing_requirements.reason: No party system, party invitations, boss encounters, or multiplayer combat instances exist

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement player-to-player trading system within guilds where members can exchange items and resources
missing_requirements.reason: No trading interface, item exchange UI, trade confirmation flow, or trade history logging exists

missing_requirements.requirement: Create guild wars feature where guilds can challenge each other in competitive battles for rewards and rankings
missing_requirements.reason: No guild war declaration, battleground, win conditions, rankings, or guild war rewards exist

missing_requirements.requirement: Build resource gathering system where players can collect materials from the environment (ore, herbs, wood) during exploration
missing_requirements.reason: Crafting page shows hardcoded inventory but no resource nodes in 3D world, no gathering interaction, no resource spawning logic exists

missing_requirements.requirement: Create crafting system where players can combine resources to create weapons, armor, and potions using recipes
missing_requirements.reason: Crafting page has recipes but uses local state only. No backend persistence, no integration with player inventory system, crafted items don't appear in player inventory

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement player-driven marketplace where users can list items for sale, browse listings, and purchase from other players
missing_requirements.reason: Marketplace uses mock listings only. No functionality to list items for sale, no real player-to-player transactions, search/filter not functional

missing_requirements.requirement: Create seasonal event system that activates limited-time quests, challenges, and exclusive rewards on a schedule
missing_requirements.reason: No seasonal events, event activation logic, event-specific quests, or event scheduling system exists

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement daily rewards system that grants players bonuses for logging in each day with streak tracking
missing_requirements.reason: No daily login rewards, streak counter, reward quality scaling, or streak reset logic exists

missing_requirements.requirement: Create in-app challenge system with rotating daily and weekly challenges that reward players for completing specific objectives
missing_requirements.reason: No challenge system, daily/weekly rotation, challenge progress tracking, or automatic reward granting exists
